title: Kipp the Copper Coast Kid
description: In the great tradition of Huckleberry Finn and the Adventures of Tom Sawyer, comes a modern classic for the ages. All Kipp wants to do is explore the old local mines with his dog Nip. But when the girl of his dreams enters the picture, his life becomes more complex, and far more interesting. But the fact of her existence, together with other unforeseen circumstances, will throw Kipp's world into a tail spin and he will need to draw on all his wits to save the ones he loves.
author: Paul G. Day
